object.package: [E]项目周报.[A]客户模块.[20]投行专项.[2008]项目周报

constraint.SQL: ["ID IN (SELECT ORGID FROM JGCRM.LBMEMBER WHERE ROLEID = 91 AND USERID = {0})",[{"expression":"$Login.User","scale":0,"length":0,"type":1}]]

column.describe: 是否实质性介入或进场工作

column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '确认提交本周周报?'

column.describe: 是否实质性介入或进场工作

column.name: SFJR
column.describe: 是否实质性介入或进场工作

constraint.SQL: ["ID IN (SELECT ORGID FROM JGCRM.LBMEMBER WHERE ROLEID IN (6,104) AND USERID = {0})\r\nAND ID IN (SELECT ID FROM ECIF.TEMP_FWJLS)",[{"expression":"$Login.User","scale":0,"length":0,"type":1}]]

column.name: CZBM
column.disable-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var  v_count = ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ORGID) FROM JGCRM.LBMEMBER WHERE ROLEID = 91 AND USERID = ?",[$Login.User]);
if (v_count >1)
{
false;
} 
else{
true;
}

constraint.SQL: ["ID IN (SELECT ORGID FROM JGCRM.LBMEMBER WHERE ROLEID IN (6,104) AND USERID = {0})\r\nAND ID IN (SELECT ID FROM ECIF.TEMP_FWJLS)",[{"expression":"$Login.User","scale":0,"length":0,"type":1}]]

column.name: DQ2
column.disable-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
if (XMLX2!=5){
O_THIS.getColumn("FXSL2").setLabel("<font color=red>*</font>发行股数(万股)");
}
else{
O_THIS.getColumn("FXSL2").setLabel("发行股数(万股)");
O_THIS.getColumn("XMZSR2").setLabel("项目净收入(万元)");
}
1==0

column.name: SFJR2
column.describe: 是否实质性介入或进场工作

column.name: XMJZQK2
column.disable-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
 if(XMLX2==17)
{
O_THIS.getColumn("SSRQ2").setLabel("完成日期");
}
O_THIS.getColumn("P_SSRQ").setLabel("上市日期");
1==0

column.name: LXR2
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
if (XMJD2.XSSX>=3){
O_THIS.getColumn("BJDBR2").setLabel("<font color=red>*</font>保荐代表人");
O_THIS.getColumn("XBR2").setLabel("<font color=red>*</font>协办人");
}
else{
O_THIS.getColumn("BJDBR2").setLabel("保荐代表人");
O_THIS.getColumn("XBR2").setLabel("协办人");
}
1==0
